article_title: Funeral of killed hostage held in southern Israel.
sentence: Funeral  of  killed  hostage  held  in  southern  Israel.

article_title: Funeral of killed hostage held in southern Israel.
sentence: Mourners  have  gathered  for  the  funeral  of  Samer  Talalka,  22,  one  of  the  three  hostages  who  were  mistakenly  killed  by  Israeli  military  yesterday,  having  been  held  by  Hamas  in  Gaza.
